languages.text: "Станцию переоборудовать под форпост и отбуксировать в систему Даргонуса. Пусть охраняет мою столицу".
languages.translation_comment: Даргонус получает колониальный баф HeriokhsRim_Fort_buff на + много Безопасности
Даргонус получает колониальный баф HeriokhsRim_Fort_buff на + много Безопасности

languages.text: "I want this station converted into an outpost and towed to the Mundus Valancius System. Let it guard my capital."
languages.original_text: "Станцию переоборудовать под форпост и отбуксировать в систему Даргонуса. Пусть охраняет мою столицу".

traits.locale_text: "I want this station converted into an outpost and towed to the Dargonus system. Let it guard my capital."
"I want this station converted into an outpost and towed to the Dargonus system. Let it guard my capital."
"I want this station converted into an outpost and towed to the Dargonus system. Let it guard my capital."
"I want this station converted into an outpost and towed to the Dargonus system. Let it guard my capital."
"I want this station converted into an outpost and towed to the Mundus Valancius System. Let it guard my capital."
"I want this station converted into an outpost and towed to the Mundus Valancius System. Let it guard my capital."

languages.text: "Ich möchte, dass diese Station in einen Außenposten umgewandelt und in das Mundus-Valancius-System geschleppt wird. Sie soll meine Hauptstadt bewachen."
languages.original_text: "I want this station converted into an outpost and towed to the Mundus Valancius System. Let it guard my capital."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte, dass diese Station in einen Außenposten umgewandelt und in das Mundus-Valancius-System geschleppt wird. Sie soll meine Hauptstadt bewachen."

languages.text: « Je veux que cette station soit convertie en avant-poste et remorquée jusqu'au système de Mundus Valancius. Elle assurera la sécurité de ma capitale. »
languages.original_text: "I want this station converted into an outpost and towed to the Mundus Valancius System. Let it guard my capital."

traits.locale_text: « Je veux que cette station soit convertie en avant-poste et remorquée jusqu'au système de Mundus Valancius. Elle assurera la sécurité de ma capitale. »

languages.text: «Quiero que la estación se convierta en un puesto de avanzada y se remolque hasta el sistema Mundus Valancius. Allí custodiará mi capital».
languages.original_text: "I want this station converted into an outpost and towed to the Mundus Valancius System. Let it guard my capital."

traits.locale_text: «Quiero que la estación se convierta en un puesto de avanzada y se remolque hasta el sistema Mundus Valancius. Allí custodiará mi capital».

languages.text: 「このステーションを前哨基地に改造し、ムンドゥス・ヴァランシウス星系まで曳航してほしい。我が首都を守らせるのだ」
languages.original_text: "I want this station converted into an outpost and towed to the Mundus Valancius System. Let it guard my capital."

traits.locale_text: 「このステーションを前哨基地に改造し、ムンドゥス・ヴァランシウス星系まで曳航してほしい。我が首都を守らせるのだ」

languages.text: “我要把这座星站改造成前哨站，把它拖到瓦兰修斯领去。让它来守护我的首都吧。”
languages.original_text: "I want this station converted into an outpost and towed to the Mundus Valancius System. Let it guard my capital."

traits.locale_text: “我要把这座星站改造成前哨站，把它拖到瓦兰修斯领去。让它来守护我的首都吧。”

languages.text: "İstasyonun bir karakola dönüştürülerek Mundus Valancius Sistemi'ne taşınmasını istiyorum. Orada başkentimi korusun."
languages.original_text: "I want this station converted into an outpost and towed to the Mundus Valancius System. Let it guard my capital."
